name: Blitz!
description:
Dash around the arena and defeat your enemies! Coins buff and debuff you at the same time. Collect the coin you see fit to win the game!

  • Sword Coin (Red)
    • Increases dash distance
    • Decreases movement speed
  • Boot (Blue)
    • Increases movement speed
    • Increases ability cooldown
  • Crosshair (Yellow)
    • Decreases ability cooldown
    • Decreases dash distance
